text: Maldare is a small village in Kodagu district of Karnataka state, India. ==Location== Maldare is located on the forest road between Piriyapatna and Siddapura. https://www.google.com/maps/dir/@12.3011345,76.0966355,13z/data=!4m4!1m3!3m2!1s0x3ba5a44c5af49177:0xa5a6571a7d656c5d!2sMaldare,+Karnataka+571253,+India ==Distance== Madikeri, 31 km Virajpet, 26 km Mangalore, 175 km Bangalore, 223 km ==Post Office== There is a post office at Maldare village. The pincode is 571523.http://www.indiamapia.com/Kodagu/Maldare.html ==Suburbs and villages== * Mekur Hosakeri - 12 km * Nanjarayapatna - 12 km * Valnur Thyagathur - 12 km * Thithimathi - 13 km * Ammathi - 17 km ==Demographics== The village of Maldare has a population of 2,027 and there are a total of 525 houses. The people here speak Kannada and Malayalam.http://www.census2011.co.in/data/village/618025-maldare- karnataka.html ==Schools== Ekalavya Vasathi School Balugodu St Annes School Minority School * Maldare School ==References== Category:Villages in Kodagu district
title: Maldare
